Comments_List: Develop entrepreneurship ideas into a venture and continue modifying ideas into perfection
Important frameworks for conceiving, organizing, and launching a startup social venture.
Largely aligned, though sometimes the coursework overwhelmed my time and ability to think creatively about the venture.

Strenghs: Very interactive, the book is really good
Weaknesses: The professor never dedicated one single moment to speak to my team in person during class exercises

Strengths: 
Clear-outlined training on developing a social-focused venture.
Throughout the semester, many social entrepreneurs have been invited to the class to share their experiences. This has been super helpful to give students a better sense of entrepreneurship. 

Weaknesses: 
It is challenging to change ideas in the middle of the semester. 
Homework or assignments sometimes feel overwhelming and do not necessarily help with the idea generation and development.

Strengths: excellent frameworks for designing and launching a startup.

Weaknesses: not enough feedback from and direct engagement with instructor on the venture early enough to make important and necessary adjustments to fully maximize the venture.
Take it only if you are really wanting to start a venture of your own

I suggest having a relatively clear vision of a venture you want to develop or joining a group with a defined vision for a venture. 

Don't lose faith among those weekly assignments.
Make sure to engage directly with the professor early on to get feedback, given the fast pace of the course.
